title: "Accelerated Aging: Study Turns Young Mice Old in a Matter of Weeks"
excerpt: "Researchers inhibited somatostatin interneurons in a subregion of the hippocampus, inducing aging-related cellular and behavioral changes. This study establishes a causal link between reduced interneuron function and cognitive decline,"
